  • December 05, 2013

    Sass Media Query Helper For Designers

    A configurable design tool that displays the current min-width media query in the bottom right corner of your screen and updates as you re-size the browser window.

    A front-end tool for generating static sites with Grunt, Bower, Assemble, Sass, Bourbon, Bourbon Neat.

  • May 12, 2013

    Omega Reset For Bourbon Neat

    A Sass mixin for Bourbon Neat that let's you change the number of columns at any breakpoint.
